thread.title: “The American Empire has always been a bipartisan project”
thread.title_full: “The American Empire has always been a bipartisan project”

author: Lyzza
title: “The American Empire has always been a bipartisan project”
text: Posts: 1,159 The American Empire has always been a bipartisan project Oh, Howard Zinn, I wish you had been my history professor. Such an intelligent man, and yet he will end up pissing off so many small minded people, again. Maybe he needs to use more pictures and less words so they can understand?
